casebody.data:
JENZACK PARTNERS, LLC
v.
STONERIDGE ASSOCIATES, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 3, 2018 "Did the Appellate Court properly conclude that the plaintiff had standing to foreclose on the Tine mortgage because Sovereign Bank had assigned the Stoneridge note to the plaintiff, even though Sovereign Bank did not assign the Tine guarantee, for which the Tine mortgage was collateral, to the plaintiff?"

The defendant Jennifer Tine's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn.App. 128, 192 A.3d 455 (2018), is granted, limited to the following issue:
